document_data.caption: A [[gnome]] using an ear horn.
document_data.name: Ear Horn
document_data.author: [[Richard Pett]]
document_data.title: 100 Market Stalls
document_data.Usage: As the name suggested, it was a horn held up to the ear.
document_data.Availability: A [[dwarf]]-made ear horn made of [[brass]] was valued at 1 [[gp]].
document_data.Powers: The ''[[ear horn of hearing]]'' was a magical ear horn that eliminated deafness while used.
document_data.Trivia: [[Spell key]]s, which were needed to enable [[spell]]casting on the [[plane]] of [[Bytopia]], for the [[divination]] [[school of magic]] could take the form of ear trumpets or [[spyglass]]es, as these represented discerning more information.
document_data.Notable Owners:
* [[Ghorso]], an aged [[duergar]] smith working in the [[Terminus Level]] of [[Undermountain]] used an ear horn.
* [[Azrok]], a [[hobgoblin]] warlord of Undermountain, had a dwarven ear horn among the treasures in his war chest.
